134.content:
Jess grabbed you, *im not a shoe! Nooo jess!* you screamed internaly, she still couldnt hear you. She left your flat and went across the hall to one of the other 2 rooms on your floor.
She knocked on the door, you began to panic, you knew who lived here, it was 4 guys, all of which were on various sports teams.
The door opened and out stepped jake, jess handed him the shoe, he looked you, thanked her and closed the door. Imediately you were tossed onto a pile of shoes at the door opposite a mirror, you now saw how bad it was.
You were a general black sneaker and next to you was an identical shoe, except it was for a left foot, while you were for the right. You suddenly heard jake shout into the apartment "hey guys, we got our comunal shoe back, we have the pair again." Before you could process this another guy, brad came over and roughly grabs you and your twin. He rams his socked foot into the left shoe then turns his attention to you. His foot stretches you out painfully and as his foot settles and he ties your strings, his full weight crushes down on you. Just before he takes a step jake says " you gonna be long i need them for some errands later" while pointing at you. 2 more voices from the bedrooms shout out "me too"i need them". You live in a 1st floor flat with 3 room mates, emma, jess and louise. You are all in college. One day when all three are out you either become an inanimate object or get shrunk(around 1 inch).
You DO NOT get enjoyment from being small or an object and DO NOT want to be either.
